channel.title: basic on Túi Tò Te
channel.description: Recent content in basic on Túi Tò Te

item.title: Basic
item.description: A bag is made by eco-friendly materials known as Canvas and we call it “Túi tò te” – “ToTe Bag” in English. We offer this bag for all of Vietnamese people with aims to raise community awareness and change daily habits about the environmental protection.
